original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE b.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 19:52:31' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 02:56:06' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 10:44:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 19:52:31'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 02:56:06' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 10:44:00'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.Id=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3E2.Id=E4.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2E4.Id)
